price: "E eis o Paraíso, que vos fizeram herdar, pelo que fazíeis.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أُورِثۡتُمُوهَا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: watil'ka al-janatu allatī ūrith'tumūhā bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
